thread.title: Upcoming FIFA course for Women Football Adminstrators rescheduled to November 9-13
thread.title_full: Upcoming FIFA course for Women Football Adminstrators rescheduled to November 9-13

title: Upcoming FIFA course for Women Football Adminstrators rescheduled to November 9-13
text:
18:42 CET Upcoming FIFA course for Women Football Adminstrators rescheduled to November 9-13 By Ghana FA 
The Ghana Football Association has rescheduled the date for the upcoming FIFA Administrative course. 
The course which was earlier scheduled for 15th -20th November, 2015 has now been fixed for Monday 9th -13th November, 2015. 
All National Women's Football Administrators, Regional Women's Football Committee members and members of the Women's League Board should kindly take note of the change of date.
